pages.text:
Membership at PGA National Members Club
A Luxury Lifestyle. Exclusively Yours.
BECOME A MEMBER
Located in the center of a bustling residential neighborhood, PGA National Members Club has served as the social epicenter of the Palm Beach Gardens community for over four decades. PGA National is steeped in rich golf tradition, having hosted a litany of the world’s most prestigious golf events including the Ryder Cup, PGA Championship, Senior PGA Championship, and at present, the PGA TOUR’s famed Cognizant Classic.
Today, the Members Club exemplifies the luxurious South Florida lifestyle that has attracted residents to our area for years. It offers exclusive access to world-class golf, exceptional amenities, and most importantly, a haven for members seeking community, fellowship, and unrivaled lifestyle experiences.
An exciting new era has just begun at PGA National Members Club.  The newly renovated Member’s Club features two new Andy Staples designed courses, the Match and the par 3, 9-hole Staple course.
Enhanced member experiences are available in the newly-reimagined Members Clubhouse – featuring a robust programming calendar designed to engage every member of the family.  This is the perfect time to enjoy all that PGA National Members Club has to offer.
Visit PGA Members Club Website
Memberships are available for residents and non-residents of the PGA National Resort community.  Both families and individuals are welcome.
Golf Membership
For those looking for the ultimate South Florida club lifestyle experience, we’re proud to offer the exclusive Golf Membership, which includes access to all PGA National golf courses, lifestyle amenities and a robust year-round calendar of events.
Junior Executive
(Under 40)
Experience the pinnacle of South Florida’s club lifestyle with our exclusive Junior Executive Membership. Enjoy access to all PGA National golf courses, premier amenities, and a vibrant year-round social calendar.
Tailored for the next generation of golf enthusiasts, our Junior Executive Membership is available for those under 40.
Resort Social Membership
Resort Social Members enjoy access to the fitness center, Membership Clubhouse, resort pool and amenities, croquet and all dining outlets. With sixteen Har-Tru tennis courts (eleven lit for night play), twelve pickleball courts and one pop tennis court, you can enjoy exhilarating matches day or night.
Sports Membership
Unleash your passion with tennis, croquet, fitness and other lifestyle activities with our Sports Membership. Sports Members enjoy access to all of PGA National’s amenities and social events including limited golf access, ideal for casual players and those just beginning their golf journey.
The PGA National Lifestyle, In Their Words
“
The Sports and Racquet Club delivers on its promise to meet all fitness needs for PGA members. With state-of-the-art facilities, diverse classes, and exceptional staff, it's an ideal destination for staying active and healthy.
“
This was by far the best July 4th event we have ever had. From the festive decorations to the many activities for all ages, it was a wonderful celebration and incredible to see so many young families participating. We're truly grateful for the creativity and enthusiasm that has elevated our Members Club experience.
“
The updated fitness center, daily classes, and relaxing amenities like the sauna and jacuzzi make every visit rewarding. The staff, trainers, and physical therapists are always available with expert guidance.
“
Awesome night—so well planned. We loved everything from the food to the events.
“
The 16 tennis courts and 12 pickleball courts, plus vibrant leagues and clinics, make SRC a dream for racquet sports enthusiasts. The professional coaching team creates opportunities for every skill level.
“
Between the Wednesday night Mix n' Mingle, monthly specialty dinners, and memorable holiday celebrations, members are now enjoying a true club experience. We're most appreciative of everything you've brought to our community.
slide counter
/
Note:
These testimonials were collected directly from member communications and personal feedback.

Club Fitting
Do you want to live a luxury lifestyle, exclusively yours? Become a Member of PGA National Resort. Memberships are available for both residents and non-residents of the PGA National Resort community.  To choose what’s right for you and/or your family, we offer flexible Membership options.
Membership Options:
Golf Membership
– For those looking for the ultimate South Florida club lifestyle experience, we’re proud to offer the exclusive Golf Membership, which includes access to all PGA National golf courses, lifestyle amenities and a robust year-round calendar of events. Junior Executive Memberships available for those under 40.
Sports Membership
– Unleash your passion with tennis, croquet, fitness and other lifestyle activities with our Sports Membership. Sports Members enjoy access to all of PGA National’s amenities and social events including limited golf access, ideal for casual players and those just beginning their golf journey.
Resort Social Membership
– Resort Social Members enjoy access to the fitness center, Membership Clubhouse, resort pool and amenities, croquet and all dining outlets. With sixteen Har-Tru tennis courts (eleven lit for night play), twelve pickleball courts and one pop tennis court, you can enjoy exhilarating matches day or night.
Please fill out the form below, indicating which membership you are interested in, and our Membership Team will get back to you shortly. (Be sure to ask them about our upcoming Summer Membership Specials!)

About PGA National Resort
Ninety-nine holes of championship golf on six courses, including the famed Champion course — home to the popular PGA TOUR’s Cognizant Classic — as well as a state-of-the-art Sports & Racquet Club featuring 16 tennis courts and a 40,000-square-foot spa with the exclusive Waters of the World outdoor mineral pools.
Following a $100 million transformation, we thoughtfully reimagined luxury, from interior and exterior designs to all-new restaurants, activities, and amenities—experience legendary moments only at PGA National Resort.
PGA National Members Club
Enjoy full country club privileges with luxury resort benefits in the heart of Palm Beach Gardens. As a member of PGA National, you can stay, play, and live the PGA lifestyle, 365 days a year.
View Memberships
Getting Here & Around
We’re conveniently located just north of West Palm Beach, and within an hour of three international airports.
Download Map PDF

About Beef Wellington Experience at The Butcher's Club
Museums
Explore local history and art at renowned museums near PGA National Resort. The Henry Morrison Flagler Museum invites you to tour Whitehall, the Gilded Age mansion of the railroad tycoon, with options to dine in the café and enjoy concerts or lectures. The Norton Museum of Art in West Palm Beach showcases an international collection of paintings, photography, and sculptures, including works by Matisse, Picasso, O’Keeffe, and Pollock. For a historic experience, head to the Jupiter Inlet Lighthouse & Museum to tour exhibits, explore scenic grounds, and climb the iconic 1860 lighthouse.
read more
+
Learn more
About Museums
Performing Arts
Enjoy the vibrant performing arts scene near PGA National Resort. The iThink Financial Amphitheatre, an open-air venue, hosts major touring acts for up to 19,000 fans with stunning views of West Palm Beach. At the Kravis Center for the Performing Arts, you’ll experience a wide array of performances from companies like Miami City Ballet, Palm Beach Opera, and Palm Beach Pops. Just north, the Maltz Jupiter Theatre offers professional theater with plays, musicals, and children’s matinees, while the Palm Beach Opera presents renowned productions and special events annually.
read more
+
Learn more
About Performing Arts
Sports & Racquet Club
Whether you’re interested in addressing a specific aspect of your game, playing on Palm Beach’s premier tennis and pickleball courts, PGA National Resort’s Racquet Sports Club serves up a memorable experience. With 16 Har-Tru tennis courts (11 lit for night play), 12 new pickleball and 2 pop tennis courts, we’re geared up for exhilarating matches day or night. Elevate your game, address specific aspects, and indulge in championship-level amenities.
read more
+
Learn more
About Sports & Racquet Club
Beaches
The PGA National Resort is situated next to a number of Palm Beach Gardens beaches and South Florida beaches. A rare rock beach and vast natural beaches are just a short drive from the resort. You can watch waves crash against the rocks for a relaxing stroll and sink your toes into the sand by arranging your transportation with our concierge.
read more
+
Learn more
About Beaches
Nightlife
In downtown West Palm Beach, restaurants, bars, clubs — and a see-and-be-seen crowd — have plenty of places to choose from when looking for to have a good time
read more
+
Learn more
About Nightlife
Worth Avenue
Lined by palm trees and charming boutiques, Worth Avenue is one of the country’s best streets — and where Palm Beach’s reputation for superb shopping originates. Walk the “vias” to browse designer shops and premier retailers.
read more
+
Learn more
About Worth Avenue
PGA Commons
This mixed-use village enlivens one mile of PGA Boulevard with boutiques, galleries and restaurants. Come to shop, eat or simply to walk The Commons’ brick paths past outdoor sculptures, chess and checkers tables.
read more
+
Learn more
About PGA Commons
Legacy Place
Stroll Palm Beach Gardens’ “Main Street” for your choice of more than 40 restaurants, salons and spas, grocers, and retailers. The shops range from national retailers to local favorites for fashions, goods, and services.
read more
+
Learn more
About Legacy Place
The Gardens Mall
A Palm Beach Gardens shopping destination with more than 160 specialty shops, anchored by Nordstrom, Saks Fifth Avenue, Bloomingdale’s, and Macy’s. The indoor center also hosts a food court and popular mall restaurants.
read more
+
Learn more
About The Gardens Mall
CityPlace
Shop alongside perfectly manicured palms and a water fountain at West Palm Beach’s open-air collection of shops and restaurants (with a nod to the upscale). Show your hotel key or out-of-town driver’s license for a complimentary gift.
read more
+
Learn more
About CityPlace
Golf Pro Shop
• Daily 7:00 AM – 6:00 PM • Located adjacent to Birdie's Diner • In-house extension: 5555. The latest in golf equipment and designer apparel for the entire family.
read more
+
Learn more
About Golf Pro Shop
Sugarplume
• Daily 11:00 AM – 6:00 PM • Located at the Resort Offering eye-catching chocolate confections and an array of sweet delicacies
read more
+
Learn more
About Sugarplume
Eco Tours
From swamp buggy safaris and Japanese bonsai gardens to West Palm Beach airboat rides, there is a world of wild experiences to choose from when you’re at PGA National Resort. Take a look at some of favorite local eco-tours below and start planning your next adventure.
read more
+
Learn more
About Eco Tours
South Florida Science Center and Aquarium
Eureka! This fantastic complex in West Palm Beach is sure to entertain and educate everyone in the family. Enjoy great exhibitions, live shows, science camps, and even a miniature golf course in the middle of a butterfly garden.
read more
+
Learn more
About South Florida Science Center and Aquarium
Palm Beach Zoo & Conservation Society
Kids of all ages go wild for the Palm Beach Zoo & Conservation Society. Home to more than 500 animals on 23 shaded tropical acres, there’s also a Nature Play Pavilion, Kid Zone, Play Fountain, and Tropics Café.
read more
+
Learn more
About Palm Beach Zoo & Conservation Society
Grassy Waters Preserve
Get a taste of the Everglades just 10 minutes from PGA National. This 23-square-mile wetlands ecosystem in West Palm Beach is home to everything from alligators to armadillos and great blue herons to great horned owls.
read more
+
Learn more
About Grassy Waters Preserve
Rapids Water Park
Grab a swimsuit and head to South Florida’s largest water park, where 42 of the biggest, wettest, most thrilling water slides and splashy attractions will keep everyone feeling cool. Just 14 minutes’ drive away from PGA National.
read more
+
Learn more
About Rapids Water Park
Jupiter Inlet Lighthouse & Museum
The waterfront museum, exhibits, and conserved grounds put the spotlight on 5,000 years of regional history. And for a vertical hike, it’s 105 steps to the top of pink-colored Jupiter Inlet Lighthouse, built all the way back in 1860.
read more
+
Learn more
About Jupiter Inlet Lighthouse & Museum
BLADE Private Air Transport
Start your stay relaxed and stress-free with BLADE, PGA National Resort’s Enhanced Aviation service.
read more
+
Learn more
About BLADE Private Air Transport

Book your pickleball clinic now!

read more

Sportfishing in Palm Beach
All aboard the 34′ Fishing Machine, custom built by Ocean Master Boat.

Historic Palm Beach Bicycle Tour
Bicycle along the waterfront of Palm Beach Island. Join us on a journey into the then and now of the iconic Palm Beach Island with a guided 2-hour bicycle tour along the intracoastal waterway which is lined with the mega mansions of the rich and famous.
read more
+
Learn more
About Historic Palm Beach Bicycle Tour

Explore local history and art at renowned museums near PGA National Resort. The Henry Morrison Flagler Museum invites you to tour Whitehall, the Gilded Age mansion of the railroad tycoon, with options to dine in the café and enjoy concerts or lectures. The Norton Museum of Art in West Palm Beach showcases an international collection of paintings, photography, and sculptures, including works by Matisse, Picasso, O’Keeffe, and Pollock. For a historic experience, head to the Jupiter Inlet Lighthouse & Museum to tour exhibits, explore scenic grounds, and climb the iconic 1860 lighthouse.
read more
+
Learn more
About Museums
Performing Arts
Enjoy the vibrant performing arts scene near PGA National Resort. The iThink Financial Amphitheatre, an open-air venue, hosts major touring acts for up to 19,000 fans with stunning views of West Palm Beach. At the Kravis Center for the Performing Arts, you’ll experience a wide array of performances from companies like Miami City Ballet, Palm Beach Opera, and Palm Beach Pops. Just north, the Maltz Jupiter Theatre offers professional theater with plays, musicals, and children’s matinees, while the Palm Beach Opera presents renowned productions and special events annually.
read more
+
Learn more
About Performing Arts
Sports & Racquet Club
Whether you’re interested in addressing a specific aspect of your game, playing on Palm Beach’s premier tennis and pickleball courts, PGA National Resort’s Racquet Sports Club serves up a memorable experience. With 16 Har-Tru tennis courts (11 lit for night play), 12 new pickleball and 2 pop tennis courts, we’re geared up for exhilarating matches day or night. Elevate your game, address specific aspects, and indulge in championship-level amenities.
read more
+
Learn more
About Sports & Racquet Club
Beaches
The PGA National Resort is situated next to a number of Palm Beach Gardens beaches and South Florida beaches. A rare rock beach and vast natural beaches are just a short drive from the resort. You can watch waves crash against the rocks for a relaxing stroll and sink your toes into the sand by arranging your transportation with our concierge.
read more
+
Learn more
About Beaches
Nightlife
In downtown West Palm Beach, restaurants, bars, clubs — and a see-and-be-seen crowd — have plenty of places to choose from when looking for to have a good time
read more
+
Learn more
About Nightlife
Worth Avenue
Lined by palm trees and charming boutiques, Worth Avenue is one of the country’s best streets — and where Palm Beach’s reputation for superb shopping originates. Walk the “vias” to browse designer shops and premier retailers.
read more
+
Learn more
About Worth Avenue
PGA Commons
This mixed-use village enlivens one mile of PGA Boulevard with boutiques, galleries and restaurants. Come to shop, eat or simply to walk The Commons’ brick paths past outdoor sculptures, chess and checkers tables.
read more
+
Learn more
About PGA Commons
Legacy Place
Stroll Palm Beach Gardens’ “Main Street” for your choice of more than 40 restaurants, salons and spas, grocers, and retailers. The shops range from national retailers to local favorites for fashions, goods, and services.
read more
+
Learn more
About Legacy Place
The Gardens Mall
A Palm Beach Gardens shopping destination with more than 160 specialty shops, anchored by Nordstrom, Saks Fifth Avenue, Bloomingdale’s, and Macy’s. The indoor center also hosts a food court and popular mall restaurants.
read more
+
Learn more
About The Gardens Mall
CityPlace
Shop alongside perfectly manicured palms and a water fountain at West Palm Beach’s open-air collection of shops and restaurants (with a nod to the upscale). Show your hotel key or out-of-town driver’s license for a complimentary gift.
read more
+
Learn more
About CityPlace
Golf Pro Shop
• Daily 7:00 AM – 6:00 PM • Located adjacent to Birdie's Diner • In-house extension: 5555. The latest in golf equipment and designer apparel for the entire family.
read more
+
Learn more
About Golf Pro Shop
Sugarplume
• Daily 11:00 AM – 6:00 PM • Located at the Resort Offering eye-catching chocolate confections and an array of sweet delicacies
read more
+
Learn more
About Sugarplume
Eco Tours
From swamp buggy safaris and Japanese bonsai gardens to West Palm Beach airboat rides, there is a world of wild experiences to choose from when you’re at PGA National Resort. Take a look at some of favorite local eco-tours below and start planning your next adventure.
read more
+
Learn more
About Eco Tours
South Florida Science Center and Aquarium
Eureka! This fantastic complex in West Palm Beach is sure to entertain and educate everyone in the family. Enjoy great exhibitions, live shows, science camps, and even a miniature golf course in the middle of a butterfly garden.
read more
+
Learn more
About South Florida Science Center and Aquarium
Palm Beach Zoo & Conservation Society
Kids of all ages go wild for the Palm Beach Zoo & Conservation Society. Home to more than 500 animals on 23 shaded tropical acres, there’s also a Nature Play Pavilion, Kid Zone, Play Fountain, and Tropics Café.
read more
+
Learn more
About Palm Beach Zoo & Conservation Society
Grassy Waters Preserve
Get a taste of the Everglades just 10 minutes from PGA National. This 23-square-mile wetlands ecosystem in West Palm Beach is home to everything from alligators to armadillos and great blue herons to great horned owls.
read more
+
Learn more
About Grassy Waters Preserve
Rapids Water Park
Grab a swimsuit and head to South Florida’s largest water park, where 42 of the biggest, wettest, most thrilling water slides and splashy attractions will keep everyone feeling cool. Just 14 minutes’ drive away from PGA National.
read more
+
Learn more
About Rapids Water Park
Jupiter Inlet Lighthouse & Museum
The waterfront museum, exhibits, and conserved grounds put the spotlight on 5,000 years of regional history. And for a vertical hike, it’s 105 steps to the top of pink-colored Jupiter Inlet Lighthouse, built all the way back in 1860.
read more
+

Club Fitting
Do you want to live a luxury lifestyle, exclusively yours? Become a Member of PGA National Resort. Memberships are available for both residents and non-residents of the PGA National Resort community.  To choose what’s right for you and/or your family, we offer flexible Membership options.
Membership Options:
Golf Membership
– For those looking for the ultimate South Florida club lifestyle experience, we’re proud to offer the exclusive Golf Membership, which includes access to all PGA National golf courses, lifestyle amenities and a robust year-round calendar of events. Junior Executive Memberships available for those under 40.
Sports Membership
– Unleash your passion with tennis, croquet, fitness and other lifestyle activities with our Sports Membership. Sports Members enjoy access to all of PGA National’s amenities and social events including limited golf access, ideal for casual players and those just beginning their golf journey.
Resort Social Membership
– Resort Social Members enjoy access to the fitness center, Membership Clubhouse, resort pool and amenities, croquet and all dining outlets. With sixteen Har-Tru tennis courts (eleven lit for night play), twelve pickleball courts and one pop tennis court, you can enjoy exhilarating matches day or night.
Please fill out the form below, indicating which membership you are interested in, and our Membership Team will get back to you shortly. (Be sure to ask them about our upcoming Summer Membership Specials!)

SPA FAQ
What are the benefits of the Wellness Club Membership?
With Membership, enjoy exclusive access to the unparalleled sanctuary of Palm Beach Gardens. Experience wet and dry saunas, water spas, meditation areas, the resort fitness center, and our "Waters of the World" with three unique mineral pools. Members receive 20% off spa treatments, retail items at the Spa Boutique, food and drinks at the Spa Café, and Banyan Buddies Kids Club. Indulge in a thoughtfully curated selection of treatments available exclusively to Members, including seasonal offerings and special savings designed just for you.
Is there a minimum commitment period for the membership?
Membership is month-to-month and may be canceled at any time.
What if I need to cancel my membership?
Membership is month-to-month and may be canceled at any time.
Can I put my membership on hold?
The membership may be placed on hold or canceled and reinstated at any time.
What are the terms for the Banyan Buddies Kids Club discount? How does a member make an appointment with Banyan Buddies?
Banyan Buddies is available Thursday – Sunday from 9 am – 5 pm for children ages 4–13. For a spa member to make a reservation and receive their 20% discount, they must have a spa treatment scheduled at the time of child drop-off and provide their spa membership number. Members can call 561-627-6393 or email
[email protected]
for pricing and reservations.
Are there restrictions on fitness center or spa access?
Wellness Club Members have access to all the amenities located at the spa and access to the fitness center located inside the resort.
Blackout dates apply on holidays, spa buy-outs, and during golf tournament events.
Can I bring guests to the facilities?
Guests would need to purchase a day pass for spa access or schedule a service. We will extend 20% off to guests of the member with member present.
How do I book services with my membership discount?
Appointments may be booked online, through reservations at 800-843-7725, or in person at the spa. The members discount will be applied upon check out.
What is included in the 20% discount for members?
As a Wellness Club member, you enjoy exclusive 20% discounts off regular priced spa services and The Spa Boutique, allowing you to indulge in luxurious treatments and shop for premium wellness products at a reduced rate. Members also receive 20% off at the Spa Café, where you can enjoy nutritious meals, and at the Banyan Buddies Kids Club, making it easier for families to relax and enjoy their time at the resort.
How do I use the 20% discount at the Spa Café, Boutique, and Kids Club?
Please notify the employee of your Wellness Club membership at checkout.
When is the membership discount applicable?
The member discount is available through your active membership on regular priced spa services and the Spa Boutique, as well as at the Spa Café and Banyan Buddies Kids Club.
How do I join the Wellness Club, and when does my membership start?
In person at the spa or by phone with reservations at 800-843-7725. Payment options include major credit and debit cards. Membership benefits activate the day of purchase and renew every 30 days.

An Extraordinary Florida Wedding Email Us Contact Us: 561-227-2525 The best gift any venue can promise is to make you feel like a guest at your own wedding. At PGA National Resort, that’s our commitment to you. As your partner in creating wonderful memories, it is our pleasure to impeccably deliver every detail of your dream wedding. We’re dedicated to turning your vision into a reality. Capacity Chart Request for Proposal Wedding Photo Gallery Bella Lago Wedding Venues Vista Wedding Venues British Ballroom Wedding Venues Masters Terrace Wedding Venues The Pavilion Wedding Venues Lakeside Lawn Wedding Venues / Wedding Venues Bella Lago Bella Lago is one of PGA National Resort's newest ballrooms - an exquisite social space measuring about 2,500 square feet. This room offers sweeping views of the golf course and has a vaulted ceiling, crystal chandeliers, and a nice alcove for the bar. Bella Lago accommodates weddings of up to 180 guests for a seated dinner and is one of the most sought-after wedding venues in Florida.

Sq Ft.

Max Capacity 180 Vista With no less than 18 picture windows, this plush and private ballroom provides sweeping views of the resort's iconic zero-entry pool. At 2,310 square feet, it warmly hosts plated dinner receptions of up to 90 guests.

Sq Ft.

Max Capacity 90 British Ballroom For ceremonies or receptions of up to 175 guests with a DJ (or up to 150 with a band), this 4,400-square-foot Florida wedding venue offers the same possibilities as the PGA Grand Ballroom, but on a more intimate scale.

Sq Ft.

Max Capacity 175 Masters Terrace The new Masters Terrace connects The Pavilion with Birdie's Diner - complete with fire pit - to create an enticing outdoor wedding venue. The space is elegantly landscaped with majestic Royal Palm Trees, White Angel Begonias, Purple Lantana, Panama Rose, and seasonal color. The Masters Terrace & Birdie's Diner accommodate receptions of up to 300 guests.

Sq Ft.

Max Capacity 300 The Pavilion The Pavilion is elevated on the shores of the resort's 26-acre lake. With 7,000 square feet of space, it can easily accommodate ceremonies, rehearsal dinners, and brunches of 150 to 400 guests. The facility offers dazzling views of both the placid waters of the lake and miles of flourishing greens.

Sq Ft.

Max Capacity 400 Lakeside Lawn As part of our $100 million transformation, we recently added the new, tropically landscaped Lakeside Lawn. Our most picturesque outdoor venue, it can accommodate up to 280 guests.

Sq Ft.

Max Capacity 280 Location View All Venues Spectacular Wedding Venues For a most personalized touch, mix and match these stunning sites for your welcome reception, rehearsal dinner, ceremony, cocktail hour, wedding reception and farewell brunch. From wedding ceremonies and catering packages to guest amenities and experiences, find the answers to our most frequently asked questions about weddings at PGA National Resort. Wedding FAQs Luxe Accommodations Prepare to be smitten. Our luxurious collection of distinctive rooms and specialty suites were designed with your pleasure in mind. And with so many options to choose from, you’re bound to fall in love with at least one of them. View Accommodations Wedding Spa Services Before you glide down the aisle, step into The Spa at PGA National for a transformative experience. Our expert staff will leave you and your bridal party radiating inside and out, attending to your entire party’s every need — simultaneously. View Spa Services Catering for Weddings From PGA National’s own talented culinary team serving up light bites on the putting green, to plated four-course dinners of fine-aged beef and fresh-from-the-ocean seafood, we offer a myriad of fun and delicious ways to wine and dine your guests. View Catering / Wedding Packages Wedding Inspiration Let us help you create your perfect Florida resort wedding. PGA National Resort Golf
The challenges, the history, the legends — they’re all still here. We’ve refined our game and updated all of our renowned golf courses. When it’s time to refine your game, we rank as one of the top golf schools in Florida. More than a resort golf experience, PGA National Resort is a championship golf experience.
THE COGNIZANT CLASSIC
Watch the Best Players in the Game
Each February, The Cognizant Classic brings the world’s leading PGA TOUR players to PGA National Resort — the home of the tournament since 2007. Make sure you secure your spot at this must-see event.
Learn More
about The Cognizant Classic
/
The Champion
HTML Field, so does not need a paragraph tag
Home course of the PGA TOUR’s Cognizant Classic and "The Bear Trap", one of the most famed — and toughest — three-hole stretches in professional golf.
The Palmer
HTML Field, so does not need a paragraph tag
Named after its legendary designer, Arnold Palmer, this is generally considered our most entertaining (and forgiving) course for all skill levels.
The Fazio
HTML Field, so does not need a paragraph tag
The ideal balance where single-digit golfers are fully challenged, while higher handicaps have an excellent layout for a great day of resort golf.
The Estate
HTML Field, so does not need a paragraph tag
A great mix of challenging and docile holes, this course sets up for any level of player, as it’s one of PGA National Resort's shorter layouts.
The Match
HTML Field, so does not need a paragraph tag
Designed with match play in mind, The Match delivers a unique golf experience sure to appeal to purists, players and beginners alike.
The Staple
HTML Field, so does not need a paragraph tag
With holes ranging from 60–130 yards, this 9-hole course is perfect for experimenting with a variety of shots and is fun for players of all abilities.

PGA National Resort Golf Instruction & Services
PGA National Resort Golf Instruction & Services
Offering everything from club fittings and training techniques to professional lessons from some of the top golf schools in Florida, PGA National can elevate every aspect of your game.
Professional Lessons
As a leader in golf instruction, PGA National Resort offers a variety of lessons and training techniques for every skill level, every age. Take strokes off your game with our world-class training programs.
Golf Groups
Our PGA National Resort golf specialists make it easy to create the perfect golf getaway for your group - be it a customized corportate tournament for colleagues or a friendly golf competition with your college buddies.
Club Fitting
We want you to play better golf. IN fact, that's why we've partnered with the world's largest Indendent club fitters. So you can feel confident you're going to receive the best golf clubs for you and your game.
